Both sides of the street are lined with shops. A dark car is approaching the camera. A truck towing a tanker is moving away from the camera. | image_caption = Ross Place (State Highway 8), the main street of Lawrence | image_map = | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = New Zealand | subdivision_type1 = Region | subdivision_name1 = Otago | subdivision_type2 = Territorial authority | subdivision_name2 = Clutha District | subdivision_type3 = Ward | subdivision_name3 = Lawrence-Tuapeka | leader_title = Regional council | leader_name = Otago Regional Council | leader_title1 = Territorial authority | leader_name1 = Clutha District Council | established_title = | established_date = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | area_total_km2 = 2.19 | area_footnotes = | population_as_of = 2018 Census | population_footnotes = | population_total = 447 | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone1 = New Zealand Standard Time | utc_offset1 = +12 | timezone1_DST = New Zealand Daylight Time | utc_offset1_DST = +13 | postal_code_type = Postcode | postal_code = 9532 | area_code_type = | area_code = | website = https://www.lawrence.nz/ | blank_name = Local iwi | blank_info = NgƒÅi Tahu | footnotes = }} Lawrence is a small town in Otago, New Zealand. It is situated 35 kilometers northwest of Milton and 11 kilometers northwest of Waitahuna. It is located on State Highway 8 to the inland towns of Alexandra and Queenstown. It has an area school and a church within the township. == References == Category:Towns in Otago Category:Clutha District
title: Lawrence, New Zealand
